| HistoryText             = The Boomerang Revenge Squad was a trio of super villains assembled as part of [[Frederick Myers (Earth-616)|Boomerang]]'s plan to trick [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] into facilitating him the final piece of the [[Lifeline Tablet]], which was enchanted to be only secured by a true and selfless hero.{{r|Giant-Size Amazing Spider-Man: King's Ransom Vol 1 1}}

The team made their debut by stealing a bank to distract Spider-Man while [[Bullseye (Lester) (Earth-616)|Bullseye]] targeted Boomerang's pet, [[Gog (Tsiln) (Earth-616)|Gog]]. Spider-Man easily defeated the villains due to his costume upgrade provided by ''[[Threats and Menaces (Earth-616)|TNM]]'' which enhanced his powers.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 61}} The Boomerang Revenge Squad next intercepted Spider-Man and Boomerang when they were about to retrieve the final piece of the Lifeline Tablet, and their defeat helped strengthen the bond between Spider-Man and Boomerang. After Spider-Man retrieved the final piece, Boomerang freed the Boomerang Revenge Squad and they ambushed Spider-Man, defeating him and leaving him unconscious. Afterward, they reunited with Boomerang to celebrate the success of his plan.{{r|Giant-Size Amazing Spider-Man: King's Ransom Vol 1 1}}

| Notes                   = * The name of this team is either based on the [[Spider-Man Revenge Squad (Earth-616)|Spider-Man Revenge Squad]] or it's a direct reference to the [[w:c:dc:Superman Revenge Squad (disambiguation)|Superman Revenge Squad]] from DC Comics, which is what Spider-Man Revenge Squad's name is a riff on.
